'''v0.10.2 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' released on November 20, 2014 for Android only, to fix some bugs in [[Pocket Edition v0.10.1 alpha|v0.10.1]].

== Fixes ==
* Fixed some bugs and crashes.
* Fixed a crash when a player's touch input/crosshair intersects a space containing a block with an invalid ID.
* Fixed a crash when an arrow, dropped item, falling block, painting, primed TNT, thrown egg, or thrown snowball is in the same space as a block with an invalid ID.</onlyinclude>
